General.Name: Snowman Logistics Limited
General.Description: Snowman Logistics Limited provides temperature-controlled warehousing and distribution services in India. It operates through three segments: Warehousing Services, Transportation Services, and Consignment Agency Services. The company offers warehousing solutions and services, including ambient, chilled, frozen, and blast freezing facilities. It also provides primary transportation services, such as door-to-door, customized milk run, and part cargo consolidation services; and secondary transportation services comprising last mile distribution. The company operates 264 refrigerated vehicles. In addition, it offers retail distribution through a consignment agency services. Further, the company offers value added services, which include kitting, labelling, sorting, stuffing, and de-stuffing of containers, repacking, and bulk breaking; and sorts, grades, packs, and washes selected fruits and vegetables. It serves pharmaceuticals, meat and poultry, seafood, fruits and vegetables, ice cream, confectionery, dairy products, quick service restaurants, ready-to-eat, processed foods, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Snowman Frozen Foods Limited and changed its name to Snowman Logistics Limited in March 2011. Snowman Logistics Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Bengaluru, India.
General.Address: No.54, Old Madras Road, Bengaluru, India, 560049
